name: phishing-detector-pro
description: Real-time phishing detection Chrome extension using AI models and threat intelligence

scripts.build: npm run copy-tensorflow && npm run prepare-models
scripts.prepare-models: echo 'Model preparation would go here - download and convert models'
scripts.lint: eslint src/ background/ popup/ options/ content/
scripts.package: npm run build && zip -r phishing-detector-pro.zip . -x node_modules/\* .git/\* *.zip
